mainText:
I was born into a generation that could not have dared to Einstein, Freud,
Da Vinci, Newton, Galileo, Darwin, among others, is proud to say that I saw
and experienced the era of agreat genius. Steve Jobs leaves gallery "talented
men who changed history" to become a myth. Thank you for the honor of being
proud of my time.

A bitten apple will never have the same meaning.
header: A bitten apple will never have the same meaning
author: Alaina
